soundmuffler.title: Sound Muffler
text.config.soundmuffler_config.title: Sound Muffler config
text.config.soundmuffler_config.option.m: The lowest volume a sound can get muffled to
The range of the muffler where the minimum volume applies
text.config.soundmuffler_config.option.f: The range starting from the muffler range where sound starts falling off
The method used to modify volume over distance
